attributes.action: THE 498 MP'S WHO VOTED TO TRIGGER ARTICLE 50 MUST VOTE NO DEAL ON 13 MARCH 2019
attributes.background: On 23 June 16 17.2 Million people voted to leave the EU with the premise of Deal or No Deal. On 29 March 17 498 MP's voted to trigger Article 50 and leave the EU on 29 March 19. If The Prime Minsters Deal is voted down on the 12 March 19 then on 13 March 19 those 498 MP's must vote for a NO DEAL

rejection.details: How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
